sentence.Network_en: Different ecological distribution and dominant groups of Aphyllophorales in different vegetation types.
sentence.Network_cn: 在不同的植被类型中,其非褶菌种类的组成不同.

sentence.Network_en: Ganoderma lucidum is a species of basidiomycetes that belongs to Ganodermataceae of Aphyllophorales.
sentence.Network_cn: 灵芝是真菌类植物,在植物分类上属于非褶菌目灵芝菌科灵芝属.

PerfectNetExp.abs: aphthsiso 口疮病, aphyllophorales 多孔菌科, aphylactic 任意的

means.word_mean: 1. includes chiefly saprophytic fungi typically with shelflike bodies; sometimes placed in class Hymenomycetes or included in Agaricales
